name: Blueberry Lemon Quick Bread
author: CHERYL FISCHER
summary: You'll love this zesty lemon quick bread! It's the perfect treat for a Sunday morning. When blueberries are out of season you can use frozen blueberries instead.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan
Dredge the blueberries in 2 teaspoons flour; set aside
In a large bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy
Stir in eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition
In a separate bowl combine flour, baking powder and salt
Stir the flour mixture into the egg mixture alternately with the milk
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan
Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean
Allow bread to cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan
